name: MARMORTAL: Fhaesir's Pride
description:
Use your trusted bow against the marble gargoyles, and parkour your way up a celestial tower.

In Marmortal: Fhaesir's Pride you have made a wish to a powerful entity – yet the wish brought forth dire consequences. As a last resort you embark up towards the sacred tower where wishes are granted to try and undo yours.

Dynamically shoot and rush your way through the tower’s perilous paths as it accepts no mortals in its premises. The tower slowly turns you into stone – and attempts to cleanse itself from your influence by sending hordes of gargoyles after you.

The wishes inside the tower reveal interconnected stories of the people that wished upon its flowing waters, as you slowly learn that you might not be the first to trespass the tower either...

"Marmortal: Fhaesir's Pride" is our first demo of the game's concept, released in 2022.
A new, improved version of Marmortal is under development in Unreal Engine 5.
Stay tuned for new abilities, improved visuals and refreshed narrative!
